item_prototype.name: {#NAME} average enqueue time
item_prototype.description: Average time a message has been held this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} blocked producer warning interval
item_prototype.description: Blocked Producer Warning Interval

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} cache enabled
item_prototype.description: Caching is enabled

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} consumer count
item_prototype.description: Number of consumers described to this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} cursor full
item_prototype.description: Message cursor has reached its memory limit for paged in messages

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} cursor memory usage
item_prototype.description: Message cursor memory usage, in bytes

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} cursor percent usage
item_prototype.description: Percentage of memory limit used

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} dequeue count
item_prototype.description: Number of messages that have acknowledged (and removed from) from the destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} dispatch count
item_prototype.description: Number of messages that have delivered (but potentially not acknowledged) to consumers

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} enqueue count
item_prototype.description: Number of messages that have been sent to the destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} expired count
item_prototype.description: Number of messages that have been expired

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} in flight count
item_prototype.description: Number of messages that have been dispatched to, but not acknowledged by, consumers

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} maximum audit depth
item_prototype.description: Max audit depth

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} maximum enqueue time
item_prototype.description: The longest time a message has been held this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} maximum page size
item_prototype.description: Maximum number of messages to be paged in

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} maximum producers to audit
item_prototype.description: Maximum number of producers to audit

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} memory limit
item_prototype.description: Memory limit, in bytes, used for holding undelivered messages before paging to temporary storage

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} memory percent usage
item_prototype.description: The percentage of the memory limit used

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} memory usage portion
item_prototype.description: Portion of memory from the broker memory limit for this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} minimum enqueue time
item_prototype.description: The shortest time a message has been held this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} name
item_prototype.description: Name of this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} prioritized messages
item_prototype.description: Prioritized messages is enabled

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} producer count
item_prototype.description: Number of producers publishing to this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} producer flow control
item_prototype.description: Producers are flow controlled

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} queue size
item_prototype.description: Number of messages in the destination which are yet to be consumed. Potentially dispatched but unacknowledged.

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} slow consumer strategy
item_prototype.description: Returns the optional slowConsumer handler MBeans for this destination

item_prototype.name: {#NAME} use cache
item_prototype.description: Caching is allowed
